txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Blackened skin from the stronger beasts found throughout Bree-land. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'The skin of the stronger beasts here can be used for much the same as the weaker beasts. If you are willing we would be grateful.'
Men of Bree Task: Blackened Skin
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of blackened skin from the stronger beasts found throughout Bree-land.
Deliver the blackened skins to Second-watcher Heathstraw
You have been tasked with finding blackened skin from the stronger beasts within Bree-land. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Blackened skin from the stronger beasts found throughout Bree-land.
